attributes.action: stop the BBC funding the rediculous funding of a BIASED Eurovison Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the rediculous voting seen in tonights contest,  the british TV Licence payer should be protected from paying for a contest we stand no chance of winning anymore. as a result of voting for your neighbour.

Save our licence fee and stop being one of the "BIG FOUR"

As our licence fee is government imposed this need raised directly to the PM

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
